parameter.label: Non-Active
parameter.description: initiatives and changes take place only in groups and clusters, with little vision or ambitions for these to be echoed, at large, in the organisation.

parameter.label: Non-Compliant
parameter.description: when change is initiated it is adopted with difficulty, lack of cohesion, and strong explicit or implicit resistance.

parameter.label: Grudging
parameter.description: the over consumption of time and efforts results in permeating dissatisfaction, and a sense of frustration and lack of wellbeing and consistency.

parameter.label: Compliant
parameter.description: people adapt consistently, and formally, to change adoption, operating from gradual and progressive learnings.

parameter.label: Engaged
parameter.description: as change is initiated by driven individuals, it easily enrols a large number of people, feeling positive to expedite and deliver the expected results.

parameter.label: Committed
parameter.description: change and innovation are initiated by the majority of individuals in the organisation within their role and capacity, with a sense of purpose and undertaking.

data.label: Critical Thinking
data.description: Ability to critically reviewing the validity of views, evidence and plans.

data.label: Appreciation
data.description: Relating to others and to the world with a basic sense of appreciation, gratitude and joy.

data.label: Communication Skills
data.description: To really listen to others, to foster genuine dialogue, to advocate own views skilfully, to manage conflicts constructively and to adapt communication to diverse groups.

data.label: Empathy and Compassion
data.description: Relate to others, oneself and nature with kindness, empathy, and compassion and the intention to address the related suffering.

data.label: Inner Compass
data.description: A deep sense of responsibility, and commitment to values and goals that benefit the greater good.

data.label: Co-Creation Skills
data.description: Skills and motivation to build, develop and facilitate collaborative relations with diverse stakeholders, characterised by psychological safety and genuine co-creation.

data.label: Inclusive Mindset and Intercultural Competence
data.description: Willingness and competence to embrace diversity and include people and collectives with different views and backgrounds.

data.label: Long Term Orientation and Visioning
data.description: Formulate and sustain commitment to visions relating to the larger context.

data.label: Mobilization Skills
data.description: Inspiring and mobilising others to engage in shared purpose.

data.label: Connectedness
data.description: A keen sense of being connected with and/or being part of a larger whole, such as a community, humanity or global ecosystem.

data.label: Humility
data.description: Acting in accordance with the needs of the situation, without concern for one's own importance.

data.label: Perseverance
data.description: Sustain engagement and remain determined and patient even when efforts take a long time to bear fruit.
